mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Estate David Weddle, Sr.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Estate David Weddle, Sr. Mary Weddle, Widow Catherine Weddle, daughter Elizabeth Weddle, daughter Sovells A. Handcock, daughter Harriet H. Dillon, daughter Martha E. Cortes, daughter Simon P. Weddle, son F. M. Weddle, son and Administrator Recorded in Ledger Book 4, Page 199, in the Floyd County Courthouse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
